nodes.bodyText: id not correct. needs to be more specific to tell what kind of object this is specifying. And I guess the same or very similar objects are also used under other feature folders. wee need a shelf design at top level of data store FTAs and use objects from there as necessary.
there could be an additional layer or generalisation to use most details from their respective base objects.

nodes.bodyText: naming not acceptable like this. All names should tell us what are naming in a non-ambiguous way also keeping as succinct as possible.
Started putting "guid" instead of "_extends", needs to be changed in S-053 & S-044 too
Needs to be extends not guid
